function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Lack of synergy between top-down and bottom-up approaches","category":"Entrepreneurship","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Annual reinfection of up to 20% of people due to occupational risks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of evidence on the impact of community-based approaches on epidemiological trends and cost-effectiveness","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of incorporation of community-based approaches and diverse issues in vbd strategies","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Misinformation and lack of trust in public health actions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misuse of whatsapp leading to circulation of fake news and misinformation","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Communication of infectious diseases through human interaction and contact","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of infectious agents","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Spread of contagious diseases through the use of ontologies and query interfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of ontologies to model disease aspects can lead to unintentional release of sensitive information","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Integration of ontologies and query interfaces could lead to unintended exposure of disease-related data","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of social media data for infectious disease surveillance and monitoring.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Utilization of web-based tools for visualizing spatial-temporal disease spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Text mining approaches and semantic interoperability using covid-19 ontology","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Importing data from an unreliable or inaccurate source","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate security measures for the exported ontology data","category":"Security","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Diffusion of pandemics ontologies through various websites may lead to the spread of incorrect or incomplete information.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bias due to pseudo-replication","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Reliance on published literature and studies for uv-c doses and log reductions without independent validation introduces risk of using potentially inaccurate data","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Studies on the susceptibility of different viruses to uv irradiation could lead to the underestimation of the risk of contagion in real-world scenarios.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Spread of sars-cov-2 through contact with contaminated surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lower access to covid-19 testing post-eviction","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction leading to lower access to covid-19 testing and medical attention","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased access to primary and specialty medical care due to eviction","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Eviction amplifying the individual risk of covid-19 complications and mortality","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Traumatizing effect of eviction on children","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Repetitive exposure to racism leading to health deterioration and chronic conditions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases due to reduced outdoor socialization and increased time spent indoors.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of user participation in decision-making regarding housing issues","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate user participation in the design process","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inflow of rural population into urban areas","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting a survey and collecting data from 170 individual respondents during a pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Gathering data on the quality of everyday life during the COVID-19 pandemic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey includes a mix of urban and suburban residents, potentially representing different levels of exposure to contagious diseases.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey examines advantages and disadvantages of living in apartments and houses during the pandemic, potentially uncovering environmental factors that contribute to disease spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Survey revealing key shortcomings of current housing conditions in the context of COVID-19 restrictions","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Majority of respondents worked or studied from home","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Struggle to organize adequate work/study space in living environment","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use of vacation properties for work/study during lockdown","category":"Working","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Feeling of being trapped in an apartment during curfew","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Respondents spending more time in nature or planning to do so","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Frequent weekend \"out of town\" trips recorded by respondents","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High percentage of respondents seeking personalized adaptation of apartments","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Preference for living in houses over apartments","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of contact with nature and outdoor space during lockdown","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited space for remote work and social activities","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lower attractiveness of multi-apartment buildings compared to single-family buildings","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased satisfaction with the immediate living environment due to changes in spatial needs of occupants.","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of contact with nature as a drawback of pandemic restrictions on leaving the residence.","category":"Living","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of proper sanitation in urban agriculture spaces leading to contamination and spread of foodborne illnesses","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"}]}
